content.question: In the eighteenth century, the effectiveness of the Russian monarchy was limited by

choices.label: the enornous land area of the country
the independent position of the Orthodox church
a prosperous middle class located in fortified towns
a newly free class of former serfs

content.answer: the enornous land area of the country

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
